node.description:
__Debut__: 1998

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/amano_akira_)

Akira Amano is the author and mangaka of the shonen manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! They were born in 1973, but the month and day are unknown.  Amano began in 1998 with a job at Weekly Young Magazine. They also held a job at Shueisha Publishing Co, Ltd.  In 2002, Amano participated in a contest for aspiring mangaka and was one of the lucky winners, with their comic Monkey Business published in Young Magazine.  In 2004, they finally found success with the humorous and classy manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (or, for short, just Reborn!), and that thanks to their readers' support. This new manga was advertised more and more in Shonen Jump and became a hit. Two years later, their manga was made into an anime series by Artland studios. 

Their ideas for Reborn!: Amano had some crazy ideas to entertain readers with. They came up with weird characters to add spice to the humor, a story written especially to be unique, and fast-paced action.    

Other works:  Boy Spin (1998)  Hot Blast Baseball Legendary (1999)  Pu Chipu Chirabii (2000)  Monkey Business (2002)  Tapir Hearts HAWK! (2003)  Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (2004)    Colleagues:  Ken Osamu Sakaki  KAITO  Main pine of indigo  Kobayashi  Kasuga truth

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

Wataru is a light novel writer who is best known for being the author of [Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.](https://anilist.co/manga/70171/Yahari-Ore-no-Seishun-Love-Comedy-wa-Machigatteiru/) In March of 2009, he graduated from Meiji University in Communication and Information.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.

[Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%BE%BB%E9%99%BD)

You Tsuji is a composer and arranger.
